criteria.name: market_sizing
criteria.description: TAM/SAM/SOM with numeric values and methodology (top-down or bottom-up)

criteria.name: competitive_landscape
criteria.description: At least 3 competitors analyzed with product, pricing, strengths, weaknesses

criteria.name: pricing_recommendation
criteria.description: Specific pricing strategy with price points and value metrics, not vague suggestions

criteria.name: differentiation_clear
criteria.description: UVP and positioning statement grounded in founder's actual capabilities

criteria.name: source_citations
criteria.description: Market data backed by URLs, reports, or dated references

criteria.name: no_placeholders
criteria.description: No TODO, TBD, PLACEHOLDER, lorem ipsum, or [INSERT text
